application.description: Name of the application you are connecting to MDI. Allowed values are: "ariba", "c4c", "cdc", "commerceCloud", "concur", "hrc", "mdg", "s4", "cpq", sfsf".

businessSystemId.description: Name to be displayed in Master Data Orchestration UI. If not provided, a random UUID will be assigned.

enableTenantDeletion.description: Boolean flag to be set to true for confirming deletion of last service instance for the tenant.

writePermissions.description: Array of entities the service instance has write permission for
